buffs.name: Tree of Life
buffs.description:
Shapeshift into the Tree of Life. While in this form you increase healing received by ${bonusFromSpirit}% of your total Spirit for all party members within 45 yards, your movement speed is reduced by 20%, and you can only cast Swiftmend, Innervate, NatureÂ´s Swiftness, Rebirth, Barkskin, poison removing and healing over time spells, but the mana cost of these spells is reduced by ${costCoefficient}%.

The act of shapeshifting frees the caster of Polymorph and Movement Impairing effects.
